Kotlin.description: Modern programming language officially supported for Android development, designed to be concise and safe.

Java.description: General-purpose, object-oriented programming language widely used in Android and enterprise software.

JavaScript.description: Dynamic language mainly used for web development, also used in backend and cross-platform apps.

Swift.description: Apple's programming language for iOS and macOS development.

Jetpack Compose.description: Modern declarative UI toolkit for building native Android UIs.

CameraX.description: Android Jetpack library for simpler, consistent camera integrations.

Dagger.description: Compile-time dependency injection framework for Java and Android.

Hilt.description: Simplified DI framework built on Dagger, tailored for Android apps.

Koin.description: Lightweight Kotlin dependency injection framework without code generation.

Coroutines.description: Kotlin library for asynchronous programming with structured concurrency.

Flows.description: Cold asynchronous data stream type in Kotlin for events and data sequences.

Gradle.description: Build automation tool used in Android projects for dependency management and builds.

MVVM.description: Architecture pattern that separates UI from business logic via ViewModel.

MVP.description: Model-View-Presenter architecture that divides responsibilities to improve testability.

Retrofit.description: Type-safe HTTP client for Android and Java to consume REST APIs.

ViewBinding.description: Feature that generates type-safe bindings to views in XML layouts.

DataBinding.description: Library that binds UI components to data sources declaratively in XML.

Node.js.description: JavaScript runtime built on V8 used for backend development.

Spring Boot.description: Java framework to build production-ready backend services quickly.

REST APIs.description: Architectural style for building stateless web services over HTTP.

Github Actions.description: CI-CD platform for automating workflows from GitHub.

Azure.description: Microsoft cloud platform for compute, storage, and DevOps services.

Appcenter.description: Service for app distribution, diagnostics, and analytics.

Fastlane.description: Automation toolset for Android and iOS build and release pipelines.

Git.description: Distributed version control system for tracking code changes.

GitHub.description: Hosting service for Git repositories with collaboration tools.

GitLab.description: DevOps platform for Git repos with CI-CD and issue tracking.

Bitbucket.description: Git repository hosting and collaboration tool by Atlassian.

JIRA.description: Project management and issue tracking tool used in agile workflows.

Figma.description: Collaborative web-based design and prototyping tool.

Zeplin.description: Design collaboration tool that provides developer-friendly specs from designs.

Firebase Analytics.description: Service to track user engagement and app usage data.

Firebase Crashlytics.description: Real-time crash reporting tool for mobile apps.

Firebase Hosting.description: Web content hosting with fast global delivery.

Firebase Push Notifications.description: Messaging service for sending notifications to devices via FCM.

Firebase App Distribution.description: Tool for distributing pre-release apps to testers.

Firebase Cloud Functions.description: Serverless functions triggered by Firebase or HTTP events.

Firebase Realtime DB.description: Cloud-hosted NoSQL database syncing data in real time.

Firebase Firestore.description: Flexible, scalable NoSQL database for mobile and web apps.

Firebase Authentication.description: Service for handling user sign-in with email, password, or providers.

Firebase Remote Config.description: Tool for remotely configuring and personalizing app behavior.
